org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph

类 Execution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.Execution
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Archiveable<ArchivedExecution>, AccessExecution

    public class Execution
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccessExecution, Archiveable<ArchivedExecution>
    A single execution of a vertex. While an ExecutionVertex can be executed multiple times (for recovery, re-computation, re-configuration), this class tracks the state of a single execution of that vertex and the resources.

    Lock free state transitions

    In several points of the code, we need to deal with possible concurrent state changes and actions. For example, while the call to deploy a task (send it to the TaskManager) happens, the task gets cancelled.

    We could lock the entire portion of the code (decision to deploy, deploy, set state to running) such that it is guaranteed that any "cancel command" will only pick up after deployment is done and that the "cancel command" call will never overtake the deploying call.

    This blocks the threads big time, because the remote calls may take long. Depending of their locking behavior, it may even result in distributed deadlocks (unless carefully avoided). We therefore use atomic state updates and occasional double-checking to ensure that the state after a completed call is as expected, and trigger correcting actions if it is not. Many actions are also idempotent (like canceling).

      • attemptId

        private final ExecutionAttemptID attemptId
        The unique ID marking the specific execution instant of the task

      • globalModVersion

        private final long globalModVersion
        Gets the global modification version of the execution graph when this execution was created. This version is bumped in the ExecutionGraph whenever a global failover happens. It is used to resolve conflicts between concurrent modification by global and local failover actions.

      • stateTimestamps

        private final long[] stateTimestamps
        The timestamps when state transitions occurred, indexed by Enum.ordinal()

        private final java.lang.Object accumulatorLock
        Lock for updating the accumulators atomically. Prevents final accumulators to be overwritten by partial accumulators on a late heartbeat

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Execution

        public Execution(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                 ExecutionVertex vertex,
                 int attemptNumber,
                 long globalModVersion,
                 long startTimestamp,
                 Time timeout)
        Creates a new Execution attempt.
        参数:
        executor - The executor used to dispatch callbacks from futures and asynchronous RPC calls.
        vertex - The execution vertex to which this Execution belongs
        attemptNumber - The execution attempt number.
        globalModVersion - The global modification version of the execution graph when this execution was created
        startTimestamp - The timestamp that marks the creation of this Execution
        timeout - The timeout for RPC calls like deploy/cancel/stop.

      • getGlobalModVersion

        public long getGlobalModVersion()
        Gets the global modification version of the execution graph when this execution was created.

        This version is bumped in the ExecutionGraph whenever a global failover happens. It is used to resolve conflicts between concurrent modification by global and local failover actions.

      • tryAssignResource

        @VisibleForTesting
boolean tryAssignResource(SimpleSlot slot)
        Tries to assign the given slot to the execution. The assignment works only if the Execution is in state SCHEDULED. Returns true, if the resource could be assigned.
        参数:
        slot - to assign to this execution
        返回:
        true if the slot could be assigned to the execution, otherwise false

        public void setInitialState(TaskStateSnapshot checkpointStateHandles)

        参数:
        checkpointStateHandles - all checkpointed operator state

      • getTerminationFuture

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ExecutionState> getTerminationFuture()
        Gets a future that completes once the task execution reaches a terminal state. The future will be completed with specific state that the execution reached.
        返回:
        A future for the execution's termination

      • scheduleForExecution

        public boolean scheduleForExecution()

      • scheduleForExecution

        public boolean scheduleForExecution(SlotProvider slotProvider,
                                    boolean queued,
                                    LocationPreferenceConstraint locationPreferenceConstraint)
        NOTE: This method only throws exceptions if it is in an illegal state to be scheduled, or if the tasks needs to be scheduled immediately and no resource is available. If the task is accepted by the schedule, any error sets the vertex state to failed and triggers the recovery logic.
        参数:
        slotProvider - The slot provider to use to allocate slot for this execution attempt.
        queued - Flag to indicate whether the scheduler may queue this task if it cannot immediately deploy it.
        locationPreferenceConstraint - constraint for the location preferences
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown, if the vertex is not in CREATED state, which is the only state that permits scheduling.

      • allocateAndAssignSlotForExecution

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Execution> allocateAndAssignSlotForExecution(SlotProvider slotProvider,
                                                                                           boolean queued,
                                                                                           LocationPreferenceConstraint locationPreferenceConstraint)
                                                                                    throws IllegalExecutionStateException
        Allocates and assigns a slot obtained from the slot provider to the execution.
        参数:
        slotProvider - to obtain a new slot from
        queued - if the allocation can be queued
        locationPreferenceConstraint - constraint for the location preferences
        返回:
        Future which is completed with this execution once the slot has been assigned or with an exception if an error occurred.
        抛出:
        IllegalExecutionStateException - if this method has been called while not being in the CREATED state

      • deploy

        public void deploy()
            throws JobException
        Deploys the execution to the previously assigned resource.
        抛出:
        JobException - if the execution cannot be deployed to the assigned resource

      • stop

        Sends stop RPC call.

        public void cancel()

      • scheduleOrUpdateConsumers

        void scheduleOrUpdateConsumers(java.util.List<java.util.List<ExecutionEdge>> allConsumers)

      • fail

        public void fail(java.lang.Throwable t)
        This method fails the vertex due to an external condition. The task will move to state FAILED. If the task was in state RUNNING or DEPLOYING before, it will send a cancel call to the TaskManager.
        参数:
        t - The exception that caused the task to fail.

      • requestStackTraceSample

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<StackTraceSampleResponse> requestStackTraceSample(int sampleId,
                                                                                                int numSamples,
                                                                                                Time delayBetweenSamples,
                                                                                                int maxStrackTraceDepth,
                                                                                                Time timeout)
        Request a stack trace sample from the task of this execution.
        参数:
        sampleId - of the stack trace sample
        numSamples - the sample should contain
        delayBetweenSamples - to wait
        maxStrackTraceDepth - of the samples
        timeout - until the request times out
        返回:
        Future stack trace sample response

      • markFailed

        void markFailed(java.lang.Throwable t)
        This method marks the task as failed, but will make no attempt to remove task execution from the task manager. It is intended for cases where the task is known not to be running, or then the TaskManager reports failure (in which case it has already removed the task).
        参数:
        t - The exception that caused the task to fail.

      • sendCancelRpcCall

        private void sendCancelRpcCall()
        This method sends a CancelTask message to the instance of the assigned slot. The sending is tried up to NUM_CANCEL_CALL_TRIES times.
